overview: A man is convinced that a young girl is the reincarnation of his own daughter Audrey Rose, who died in a fiery car accident, along with his wife, two minutes before the girl was born.
tagline: Suppose a stranger told you your daughter was his daughter in another life? Suppose you began to believe him? Suppose it was true?
cast: Marsha Mason|Anthony Hopkins|John Beck|Susan Swift|Norman Lloyd
